sentence.Network_en: The lake usually ices over by mid - January.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个湖通常到了一月 中旬 就封冻了.

sentence.Network_en: Mr. Bush and John said that they wanted a deal by mid - January.
sentence.Network_cn: 布什和约翰先生说,他们需要在一月 中旬 前进行一笔交易.

sentence.Network_en: In December Ennis married Alma Beers and had her pregnant by mid - January.
sentence.Network_cn: 十二月,埃尼斯和阿尔玛?比尔斯完婚,一月 中旬,阿尔玛怀孕了.

auth_sentence.content: Chill wind It's mid-January, cold and snowy.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Chill wind It's mid-January, cold and snowy.

auth_sentence.content: Burkina Faso have until mid-January to lodge any appeal.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Burkina Faso have until mid-January to lodge any appeal.

auth_sentence.content: By mid-January, his exposure approached fifty billion euros.
